title: Megha Engineering and Infrastructure bags 2000MW Sharavathi pumped storage project
description: The Hyderabad-based MEIL won the bidding process and bagged the project. "It also saw L&T's stiff resistance as they moved Supreme Court over it but their plea was rejected and the contract awarded to MEIL", the company said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
